data.comment: Today's referee, Florent Batta, has blown to start the match.
In Lens Nantes drive forward through Randal Kolo Muani. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 3, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lens.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 6, Can Lens capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
At Stade Bollaert-Delelis, Andrei has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 8, Free kick Lens.
Florent Batta signals a Lens throw-in in Nantes's half.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Lens.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Nantes.
Important block from the Lens defence as Mehdi Abeid fires in a strike for Nantes.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 13, Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Lens.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Lens to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Throw-in Nantes.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Florent Batta awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Simon Banza (Lens) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Lens.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Free kick Lens.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Lens take a 1-0 lead thanks to Gael Kakuta.
Simon Banza with an assist there.
In the minute 28, Lens are whistled for offside.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Florent Batta awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Lens in the half of Nantes.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Lens in the half of Nantes.
Florent Batta awards the away team a throw-in.
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Nantes.
Lens's Cheick Oumar Doucoure has been booked in Lens.
Florent Batta signals a Lens throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 38, Gael Kakuta of Lens gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lens.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In the minute 40, Lens to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
In the minute 43, Lens's Cheick Oumar Doucoure gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Florent Batta awards Nantes a goal kick.
Florent Batta signals a Lens throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 44, Lens drive upfield and Cheick Oumar Doucoure gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nantes defender.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Issiaga Sylla (Lens) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 45, Nantes have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
The first-half has come to a close in Lens.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, In Lens a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Christian Gourcuff is making the team's first substitution at Stade Bollaert-Delelis with Pedro Chirivella replacing Mehdi Abeid.
Abdoul Kader Bamba is replacing Renaud Emond for Nantes at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Fabio is on a sub for Dennis Appiah for Nantes.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Lens.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Nantes.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Lens will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nantes.
Lens needs to be cautious. Nantes have an attacking throw-in.
Nantes's Randal Kolo Muani breaks free at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Throw-in for Nantes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 54, Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 55, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lens.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 59, Florent Batta awards Lens a goal kick.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Lens.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Florent Batta awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Imran Louza (Nantes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Randal Kolo Muani for Nantes drives towards goal at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 63, Gael Kakuta for Lens has been booked by Florent Batta and receives a first yellow card.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Throw-in Lens.
In the minute 66, Franck Haise (Lens) is making a first substitution, with Florian Sotoca replacing Ignatius Kpene Ganago.
Tony Mauricio is replacing Gael Kakuta for the home team.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Lens to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Nantes.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 70, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Nantes.
Randal Kolo Muani (Nantes) has received a yellow card from Florent Batta.
In the minute 72, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Florent Batta signals a Nantes throw-in in Lens's half.
The away team have replaced Imran Louza with Marcus Coco. This is the fourth substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Florent Batta waits before resuming play because Jean-Louis Leca for Lens is still down.
Jean-Louis Leca is back on the pitch.
Nantes have been awarded a penalty in Lens...
In the minute 78, Jonathan Gradit (Lens) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Abdoulaye Toure makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Lens make their third substitution with Seko Fofana replacing Yannick Cahuzac.
In the minute 84, Facundo Medina is replacing Issiaga Sylla for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 85, Nantes are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Stade Bollaert-Delelis, Loic Bade has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Marcus Coco (Nantes) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 88, Franck Haise (Lens) is making a fifth substitution, with Arnaud Kalimuendo replacing Simon Banza.
Christian Gourcuff is making the team's fifth substitution at Stade Bollaert-Delelis with Kalifa Coulibaly replacing Randal Kolo Muani.
In the minute 89, Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Lens.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lens.
Seko Fofana (Lens) strikes at Stade Bollaert-Delelis but his header is cleared.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Lens have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Lens.
Florent Batta signals a Nantes throw-in in Lens's half.
Ludovic Blas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nantes.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
